meanings.definition: A woman who is a prostitute.
meanings.sent1: The town was shocked to discover that one of the doxies was living next door.
meanings.sent2: The doxies on the street corner were soliciting passersby.
meanings.sent3: The doxies in the old western movies always wore fancy dresses.
meanings.sent4: The doxies of the night whispered secrets to the moon.
meanings.sent5: The doxies in the red light district were always surrounded by mystery.

meanings.definition: A woman who is considered sexually promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: She was labeled as one of the doxies in the gossip magazines.
meanings.sent2: The doxies at the party were the center of attention.
meanings.sent3: The doxies in the soap opera always caused drama.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as one of the doxies spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The doxies in the novel led tumultuous lives.

meanings.definition: A collection of documents or papers relating to a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The historian spent hours studying the doxies of ancient civilizations.
meanings.sent2: The doxies in the archive provided valuable insights into the past.
meanings.sent3: The doxies in the library were meticulously organized by topic.
meanings.sent4: The doxies in the research paper supported the author's claims.
meanings.sent5: The doxies in the filing cabinet were a treasure trove of information.
